TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FaultBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding

Docs.summary: Specifies the format for any error messages that might be output as a result of the operation. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `FaultBinding` class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<fault>` element enclosed by the `<operation>` element, which in turn corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> class. For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
## Examples The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `FaultBinding` class.
